channel.title: Changing a wildy area to a multi wildy area

item.title: Changing a wildy area to a multi wildy area
item.dc:creator: @njr99 njr99
item.description:
@njr99 wrote:

well i want to change an area of the wild to multi. (still wild though) i am using deltascape source.

this is my code for wildy in player.java.

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) { if (absX >= 3090 && absX >= 3959 && absY >= 9098 && absY <=9132 || (coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) { return true; } } else if (Type == 2) { if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392) && (coordX >= 2942) ) { return true; } } return false;

i want to make

if (absX >= 3090 && absX >= 3959

the multi part, how do i do that?

Read full topic
item.source: Changing a wildy area to a multi wildy area
